summary: Implements a Keras metric that computes the Intersection‑Over‑Union (IoU) for one‑hot encoded labels and predictions. It transforms one‑hot tensors to class indices, builds a weighted confusion matrix, supports class weighting, optional class ignoring, and returns the mean IoU across specified target classes.
business_intent: Allow developers to evaluate and monitor the performance of multi‑class segmentation or classification models that output probability vectors, providing a standard IoU score for model selection, hyper‑parameter tuning, and reporting.
